_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The gods of fairykind [sn31.1:1.16]: Gods who live in fragrant roots
Gods who live in fragrant heartwood
Gods who live in fragrant softwood
Gods who live in fragrant bark
Gods who live in fragrant shoots
Gods who live in fragrant leaves
Gods who live in fragrant flowers
Gods who live in fragrant fruit
Gods who live in fragrant sap
Gods who live in fragrant scents
